CoinFlip.text: %s has flipped a coin for %s. The result is %s.

CoinFlipRecently.text: A coin was flipped too recently, please wait %d seconds.

PauseResumeWarningMessage.text: Game will automatically resume in %d seconds.

PauseNoTeamReadyMessage.text: No team is ready to resume, type unpause in console to ready for your team.

PauseTooManyPausesMessage.text: Your team is out of pauses.

TournamentModeTeamReadyAlert.text: %s are ready, waiting on %s to start game.

TournamentModeReadyAlert.text: Both teams need to ready for the game to start.

TournamentModeForfeitWarning.text: %s have %d %s left to ready before forfeiting.

TournamentModeGameForfeited.text: %s have forfeit the round due to not reading within %s seconds.

TournamentModeReadyNoComm.text: Your team needs a commander to ready.

UnstuckCancelled.text: You moved or were unable to be unstuck currently.

UnstuckIn.text: You will be unstuck in %s seconds.

UnstuckRecently.text: You have unstucked too recently, please wait %d seconds.

MercApprovalNeeded.text: The opposite team will need to approve you as a merc.

MercApproved.text: %s has been approved as a merc for %s.

NSL_HEARTBEAT_OVERRIDE.text: Heartbeat Messages have been disabled for your client.

NSL_HEARTBEAT_WARN.text: Heartbeat Messages not recieved by server in the last %s seconds.  Type heartbeat in console if you are still connected, otherwise you will be disconnected!

NSL_HEARTBEAT_CRITICAL.text: Heartbeat Messages not recieved by server in the last %s seconds.  Type heartbeat in console if you are still connected, otherwise you will be disconnected in %s seconds!

MERCSHELP_1.text: %sChat command, will clear any merc approvals for your team.

MERCSHELP_2.text: %sChat or console command, will also clear any merc approvals for your team.

MERCSHELP_3.text: %sChat command, will approve opposing teams merc(s).

MERCSHELP_4.text: %sChat or console command, will approve opposing teams merc(s).

MERCSHELP_5.text: %sChat command, will approve opposing teams merc(s).

MERCSHELP_6.text: NOTE!: Approving a merc optionally accepts details to identify the target player.

MERCSHELP_7.text: NOTE!: Mercs can be approved based on name, ns2id or game ID, all of which are listed in sv_nslinfo.

NSL_MANUAL_REPLACE_PLAYER_ERROR.text: Something went wrong when caching the player :(.

NSL_SPAWNS_INVALID_UPDATE.text: Invalid usage. Usage: <marine spawn location>, <alien spawn location>

NSL_SPAWNS_UPDATED.text: Setting spawns to %s for marines and %s for aliens.

NSL_TEAM_CHOOSE_SPAWN.text: Your commander has selected %s as your spawn.

NSL_TEAM_CHOOSE_RANDOM_SPAWN.text: Your commander has selected a random spawn.

NSL_PERF_CONFIGS_ALLOWED.text: NSL Plugin now allowing access to set performance configs.

NSL_PERF_CONFIGS_DISALLOWED.text: NSL Plugin now dis-allowing access to set performance configs.

NSL_LEAGUE_ADMIN_ACCESS_ALLOWED.text: NSL Plugin now allowing access to server admin commands.

NSL_LEAGUE_ADMIN_ACCESS_DISALLOWED.text: NSL Plugin now dis-allowing access to server admin commands.

NSL_LEAGUE_MAPCYCLE_APPLIED.text: NSL Plugin now using league map cycle.

NSL_LEAGUE_MAPCYCLE_REMOVED.text: NSL Plugin now using server map cycle, map should be changed/reloaded to ensure correct cycle is loaded.

NSL_PERF_CONFIG_CURRENT.text: NSL Plugin currently using %s performance config.

NSL_PERF_CONFIG_UPDATED.text: NSL Plugin now using %s performance config.

NSL_LEAGUE_CONFIG_CURRENT.text: NSL Plugin currently using %s league config.

NSL_LEAGUE_CONFIG_UPDATED.text: NSL Plugin now using %s league config.

NSL_MODE_UPDATED_NOTE.text: NOTE: For seasonal content & server configs to work as expected, map has to be change/reloaded.

NSL_MODE_UPDATED.text: NSL Plugin now running in %s config.

NSL_MODE_CURRENT.text: NSL Plugin currently running in %s config.

NSL_ERRORREPORTER_ENABLED.text: NSL Plugin will now automatically send error reports.

NSL_ERRORREPORTER_DISABLED.text: NSL Plugin will now not send error reports.

NSL_ENFORCEGATHERBANS_ENABLED.text: NSL Plugin will now kick players with gather bans.

NSL_ENFORCEGATHERBANS_DISABLED.text: NSL Plugin will now allow players with gather bans.

SV_NSLCFG.text: %s<state> - disabled,gather,pcw,official - Changes the configuration mode of the NSL plugin.

SV_NSLCONFIG.text: %s<league> - Changes the league settings used by the NSL plugin.

SV_NSLLEAGUEADMINS.text: Toggles league staff having access to administrative commands on server.

SV_NSLLEAGUEMAPCYCLE.text: Toggles league map cycle being applied to server.  This will not overwrite server mapcycle!

SV_NSLLEAGUEPERACCESS.text: Toggles league staff having access set performance configs.

SV_NSLERRORREPORTER.text: Toggles automatic reporting of scipt errors.

SV_NSLENFORCEGATHERBANS.text: Toggles automatic kicking of players with gather bans from associated league.

SV_NSLPERFCONFIG.text: %s<config> - Changes the performance config used by the NSL plugin.

SV_NSLPASSWORD.text: %s<password> - Sets the current password on the server.

CMD_COINFLIP.text: coinflip: Simulates a coinflip and returns heads or tails.

SV_NSLSETTEAMSPAWNS.text: %smarinespawnname, alienspawnname, Spawns teams at specified locations. Locations must be exact

SV_NSLFIRSTPERSONSPECTATE.text: %sMoves you into first person spectate for the player you are currently spectating.

SV_NSLHANDICAP.text: %s<0.1 - 1> Lowers your damage to the specified percentage.

CMD_HEARTBEAT.text: %sDisables heartbeat requirement for your client.  Only use if having connection problems!

CMD_UNPAUSE.text: %sReadies your team to resume the game.

SV_NSLHELP.text: %sReturns various NSL commands and their helper messages.

SV_NSLPAUSE.text: %sWill pause/unpause game using standard delays.  Does not consume teams allowed pauses.

SV_NSLSETPAUSES.text: %s<team, pauses> - Sets the number of pauses remaining for a team.

SV_NSLINFO.text: %s<team> - marines,aliens,specs,other,all - Will return the player details from the corresponding league site.

SV_NSLSAY.text: %s<message> - Will send a message to all connected players that displays in yellow.

SV_NSLTSAY.text: %s<team, message> - Will send a message to all players on the team provided that displays in yellow.

SV_NSLPSAY.text: %s<player, message> - Will send a message to the provided player that displays in yellow.

SV_NSLFUNCTIONDATA.text: %s<player> - Will display logged client side hooks for the provided player.

SV_NSLREPLACEPLAYER.text: %s<newPlayer, oldPlayer> Will force different player to take crashed/disconnect players place.

SV_NSLLISTCACHEDPLAYERS.text: %sWill list currently cached players names and steamIDs, for sv_nslreplaceplayer cmd.

SV_NSLSETTEAMNAMES.text: %s<team1name, team2name> Will set the team names manually, also will prevent automatic team name updates.

SV_NSLSWITCHTEAMS.text: %sWill switch team names (best used if setting team names manually).

SV_NSLSETTEAMSCORES.text: %s<t1score, t2score> Will set the team scores manually.

SV_NSLSETTEAMIDS.text: %s<t1id, t2id> Will set the team ids manually.

SV_NSLAPPROVEMERCS.text: %s<team, opt. player> - Forces approval of teams mercs, '1' approving for marines which allows alien mercs.

SV_NSLCLEARMERCS.text: %s<team> - 1,2 - Clears approval of teams mercs, '1' clearing any alien mercs.

SV_NSLMERCHELP.text: %sDisplays specific help information pertaining to approving and clearing mercs.

SV_NSLFORCESTART.text: %s<seconds> - Will force the game start countdown to start in the provided amount of seconds, or 15 if blank.

SV_NSLCANCELSTART.text: %sWill cancel a game start countdown currently in progress.

CMD_READY.text: %sMarks your team as ready to begin the game.

CMD_NOTREADY.text: %sMarks your team as not ready to begin the game.

CMD_UNSTUCK.text: %sWill automatically attempt to unstuck you after a few seconds.

NSL_PLAYER_INFO_HEADING.text: IGN = In-Game Name, sID = SteamID, gID = GameID, HCap = Handicap, LNick = League Nickname, LTeam = League Team, LID = League ID

NSL_PLAYER_INFO_MESSAGE.text: IGN : %s, sID : %s, NS2ID : %s, gID : %s, HCap : %.0f%%, LNick : %s, LTeam : %s, LID : %s

NSL_PLAYER_INFO_MESSAGE_INVALID.text: IGN : %s, sID : %s, NS2ID : %s, gID : %s, HCap : %.0f%%, League Information Unavailable or Unregistered User.

NSL_FUNCTION_DATA_HEADING.text: Function data listed below, broken down per player.  Includes player info details.

SV_NSLCAPTAINSLIMIT.text: %s<limit> Changes the player limit for each team in Captains mode.

NSL_CAPTAINS_LIMIT_UPDATED.text: Captains player limit updated to %s players per team.

NSL_CAPTAINS_LIMIT_CURRENT.text: Captains player limit currently set to %s players per team.

CMD_JOINGAME.text: %sWill register you for the upcoming captains game.

CMD_LEAVEGAME.text: %sWill remove you from the upcoming captains game.

NSL_CAPTAINS_PLAYER_REGISTERED.text: %s has joined the next game, %s player slots remaining!

NSL_CAPTAINS_TOO_MANY_PLAYERS_REGISTERED.text: Unable to join, too many players already are registered!

NSL_CAPTAINS_VOTING_STARTED.text: Voting for team captains has started!  Use votecaptain in chat or console to vote

NSL_CAPTAINS_VOTED_FOR_CAPTAIN.text: Voted for %s to be a captain.  You have %s votes remaining.

NSL_CAPTAINS_SELECTION.text: Captains %s and %s have been selected!  They will now begin picking teams.

CMD_VOTECAPTAIN.text: %s<player> - Will vote for the specified player to be a captain.  2 votes allowed per player.

CMD_SELECTPLAYER.text: %s<player> - (Captains Only!) Will select the specified player to join your team.

NSL_CAPTAINS_SELECTED.text: You have been selected as a Captain!  You can use selectplayer in chat or console to pick your players when it is your turn to pick.

NSL_CAPTAIN_SWITCH_CAPTAIN_SELECTION.text: You now can select %s players!  Use selectplayer in chat or console to select the player

CMD_SELECTMAP.text: %s<map> - Will vote for the specified map.

NSL_CAPTAIN_VOTED_FOR_MAP_CHANGED.text: %s has changed their map vote from %s to %s

NSL_CAPTAINS_MODE_WELCOME_REGISTER.text: This server is running in Captains Mode!  To join the game, type joingame in chat or console during the registration phase.

NSL_CAPTAINS_MODE_WELCOME_INPROGRESS.text: This server is running in Captains Mode!  A game is currently in progress.  Once it has ended, you can register for the next game using joingame in chat or console.

NSL_CAPTAINS_ALREADY_REGISTERED.text: You have already registered for the next game!

NSL_CAPTAINS_MODE_REGISTRATION_PERIODIC.text: This server is running in Captains Mode, currently in the registration phase.  %s player(s) out of %s have registered for the next game!

NSL_CAPTAINS_MODE_VOTING_PERIODIC_WITHVO.text: %s seconds left to pick Captains.  You have %s vote(s) left.

NSL_CAPTAIN_ALL_PLAYERS_SELECTED.text: Teams have been picked, game will start once both teams ready!

NSL_CAPTAINS_MAP_VOTE_COMPLETED.text: %s won the vote, cycling in %s seconds.

NSL_CAPTAINS_MAP_VOTE_STARTED.text: Map vote has started, will end in %s seconds.

NSL_CAPTAINS_MAP_VOTE_PERIODIC.text: Map vote has %s seconds remaining, currently %s is winning.

NSL_OPPONENT_MUTE_TOGGLE.text: %sThis will hide the opposing teams chat messages if enabled.
